title: Can't log into my PBE account on boards
body: I can log into my PBE account in-game but can't log into the same account on the PBE boards. It says I have the wrong username / password.

replies.body: Double check that you're using your username and logging into the [**PBE Boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback). If that's not working, try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or trying a different browser possibly.
